address: ["The Synchronos Home Santa Ana \u2013 Lindora", " Santa Ana", " San Jos\u00e9"]
description: Open and contemporary home in Lindora. Synchronos Santa Ana is a brand-new, double-level house characterized by its open and refreshing concept. Quartz countertops, floor-to-ceiling windows and cross-ventilation characterize The Synchronos Home. This boutique residential community offers great amenities including a swimming pool, gym and vegetable garden. The area of Lindora on the west side of San Jos offers fine dining, top-ranked schools, corporate centers and much more right around the corner.Synchronos opens its doors to an open floor plan offering the social area integrated to the kitchen. The kitchen revolves around a central island that can sit three people and adds fluidity to the space. The living and dining rooms open through glass sliding doors to a covered terrace beside a manicured and private garden. Up on the second floor, the TV room precedes the Synchronos master suite that offers balcony access with beautiful views and has its own his and hers bathroom and walk-in closet. The second level also includes two secondary bedrooms that share a bathroom. A maids room, laundry area and garage space for two cars are also offered. This brand-new community offers a clubhouse for social events that opens to a beautiful sun deck around the swimming pool. A gym, vegetable plot, playground, yoga deck and co-workspace are also offered. Minutes away from the Golden Mile of Lindora, this bustling area offers a variety of stores, restaurants, services and schools, easily accessed through Route 27 coming from Escaz or from Santa Ana.

address: ["San Juan", " Naranjo", " Alajuela", " Naranjo", " Alajuela Province 20606"]
description: Located on a completely flat 300 m (3, 229 ft) lot at street level, this house combines elegance, functionality, and security in one place. The property is fully enclosed with walls and perimeter fencing, features access through electric gates, and offers a private and peaceful environment.The 113 m (1, 216 ft) house boasts modern architecture with a double-height faade that provides spaciousness and natural light. Upon entering, you are greeted by a foyer that connects to the cozy living room and the kitchen, which is equipped with fine wood cabinetry and granite countertops. The house has two bedrooms, a full bathroom, and a half bathroom, all finished with high-quality materials.The laundry area or utility patio adds extra convenience, while the covered garage provides space for one vehicle with concrete access. The entire house includes hot water, fiber-optic TV and internet service, surveillance cameras, and electric fencing, ensuring comfort and security. Additionally, it features a pleasant green area, ideal for enjoying the outdoors.The house is fully furnished for rent at $800 per month, including internet service. Water and electricity are paid separately.Its location is unbeatable: only 5 minutes from downtown Naranjo, in a very quiet area with easy access to supermarkets, clinics, schools, and colleges. Thanks to its strategic position, you can enjoy a wide variety of destinations in a short time: the airport is 35 minutes away, beaches, mountains, or the majestic Arenal Volcano and its relaxing hot springs in La Fortuna de San Carlos are just an hour and a half away. Additionally, trout or tilapia fishing spots are only 10 minutes away, and the Pos Volcano and beautiful waterfalls are 40 minutes away.This property is the ideal place for those seeking to live with style, tranquility, and closeness to nature without sacrificing urban conveniences.

description: Perched 1, 000 feet above the sparkling waters of the Pacific Ocean, The Sky Palace is a rare sanctuary where luxury, serenity, and nature converge. This brand-new, never-before-rented 3-bedroom, 2.5-bath residence spans 1, 475 sq. ft., fully furnished with elegant design, modern comforts, and breathtaking panoramic views of the Pacific Ocean and Carara National Forest. Conveniently located just minutes from Los Sueos Marina, Villa Caletas, nearby beaches, and some of Costa Ricas best surf spots, it combines privacy with easy access to world-class leisure, dining, and recreation.Wake up to the ocean breeze from two bedrooms with private balconies, enjoy sun-drenched mornings in the living area, and prepare meals in a fully equipped kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances. Every corner of this home is designed to inspire peace, creativity, and a sense of awe.Step outside and the experience continues: an infinity-edge pool, two spa hot tubs, a BBQ station, hammock decks, a yoga platform, and a recreation terrace offer moments of total relaxation against a backdrop of unparalleled vistas. A co-working space ensures productivity without compromise, and one dedicated parking spot adds ease to elevated living.Perfect for digital nomads, remote professionals, or anyone seeking a serene lifestyle surrounded by nature, elegance, and inspiration. Every detail has been thoughtfully curated to create a residence that feels like a retreat in the sky, yet a home in every sense.This is long-term living reimagined, a place for those who seek beauty, sophistication, and an extraordinary lifestyle.Available exclusively for long-term stays.Luxury, tranquility, and the best views in Costa Rica, your private palace above the Pacific Ocean awaits.

address: ["Blanca Home in Daluz \u2013 San Rafael", " Escaz\u00fa", " San Jos\u00e9"]
description: Naturally-lit spaces and contemporary architecture characterize Blanca Home in Daluz. Areas are distributed in three floors, the uppermost offering a multiuse room with a complete bathroom and access to a spacious terrace with treetop and mountain views. Blanca in Daluzs indoor social area on the main level opens to a deck-styled terrace beside a landscaped garden. This family home offers privacy and safety within the exclusive Daluz condominium in San Rafael de Escaz, minutes from Multiplaza, commercial and corporate centers, and all that Escaz offers for dining and entertainment.The faade of Blanca Home in Daluz is characterized by white contemporary design with expansive windows and manicured gardens. Upon entering, the social area offers a fresh greeting with a slate stone wall that divides the dining room from the living area and views toward the garden. Blanca in Daluzs social area incorporates plenty of natural light due to its multiple windows and has separate accesses to the terrace and the garden.The main terrace at Blanca in Daluz is a pleasant and spacious area delimited by wood columns and decked flooring. It offers open distribution with exposed wood beams in its ceilings. Part of the L-shaped garden that surrounds the house connects to this area.Back inside, the kitchen area offers a central kitchen island with travertine marble countertops, wood furniture and an incorporated prep sink. The kitchen offers two different doorways that connect to the dining room and to the terrace. The upper floor of Blanca Home in Daluz, on the second level, has the private area. Here, two secondary bedrooms share a bathroom, each equipped with a walk-in closet. The other secondary bedroom boasts a private bathroom and a wall closet. Their contemporary design is seen in its balconies and floor-to-ceiling windows. Blanca in Daluzs master suite boasts a large area, double walk-in closet and a balcony. The stunning bathroom offers two sinks opposite each other and a spacious area completely covered by marble veneer. In the middle, an exquisite Jacuzzi set slightly above floor level.In the uppermost floor, a multi-purpose room of a great size and has a large horizontal window that ensures plenty of natural light. The area has a complete bathroom and access to a terrace-styled covered balcony with green mountain views. The terrace includes a prep sink for easy clean up and entertaining.Blanca in Daluz also offers a maids room and bathroom, laundry area, 24/7 controlled access, and four parking spaces, two of them in the garage. San Rafael de Escaz is a perfect location near the best-ranked schools, exquisite restaurants and with easy and direct access to Santa Ana, Guachipeln and Escaz.

address: ["Utopia in Villa Real \u2013 Villa Real", " Santa Ana", " San Jos\u00e9"]
description: Inviting Villa Real home surrounded by beautiful gardens. Utopia in Villa Real is a two-story home characterized by its classical design with vaulted ceilings, marble floors and interconnected spaces. Filled with high-end finishes, natural light and an inviting feel, Utopia awaits in the community of Villa Real, known for its premiere security, world-class amenities and convenient location on the west side of Costa Rica's capital city of San Jos.Utopias faade greets you with earth tones and relaxed design with stone walls, tiled roofing and high ceilings. A lush garden with varied plants and trees guides you to the main entrance where two wood doors open to the foyer. Two steps below, the social area is introduced by the living room, an ample space with marble floors integrated to the dining room. The latter has a well-designed bar furniture with wood pocket doors. Both areas open through glass sliding doors to the terrace, boasting a delicate ceiling with cane detailing and exposed wood beams. This beautiful space has stone-covered walls and a built-in counter with a BBQ, sink and storage space, making it ideal for entertaining guests. Shades have been installed to protect from the rain and sun.Utopias terrace boasts an open distribution that connects to the swimming pool area. This delightful space has stone detailing and unique touches that make it seem like a natural lake, enjoyed all year round due to its solar heating system. Plenty of space for sun tanning and chilling is offered around the pool before the garden is integrated. A tall shrub hedge delimits the property, permeating the area with privacy and a natural ambience.Back inside, Utopias kitchen offers an ample area with a central kitchen counter and another spacious, L-shaped counter. This comfortable design is complementary to the Euromobilia furniture and Kitchen Aid and Frigidaire appliances. Sliding windows incorporate natural light and ventilation, making cooking at Utopia a wonderful experience. An informal dining space is integrated to the kitchen, connecting through glass sliding doors to the swimming pool and garden, and a double-swing door that opens to the dining room.The first floor features a secondary bedroom with a full bathroom, perfect to be used by guests. Also near the main entrance, a guest bathroom covered in marble veneer and featuring a marble countertop.Utopias staircase guides upstairs to the private area with elegant, iron-forged detailing and a spacious TV room outside the bedrooms. All bedrooms enjoy wood-detailed ceilings and marble floors that help create an elegant and inviting atmosphere. The master suite boasts vaulted ceilings with exposed wood beams with access to a balcony. This large bedroom offers mountain views, a large walk-in closet and a deluxe bathroom with marble veneer, vanity and a relaxing jacuzzi. Three secondary bedrooms are offered upstairs, each with an ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet. They feature wood ceilings and elegant, ivory-colored marble floors. Currently, one of the bedrooms is used as a multi-use room with a full bathroom that can become a gym, office or as secondary bedroom.Utopia also offers two garage spaces with strategic kitchen access, and outside parking for two more vehicles. The kitchen connects to the maids room, its bathroom and the laundry area. Utopias delightful garden is easily maintained through and automatic irrigation system. Villa Real is an exclusive community known for its cobbled streets and wide array of amenities. The social area offers a BBQ clubhouse beside a kids playground and a lap pool. A covered tennis court, turf soccer field and a basketball court are distributed nearby. For more formal occasions, an indoor social area is available for celebrations or any other event. Villa Real is equipped with triple-level security, hiking trails and a direct access to Route 27, minutes away from the top-quality schools, services, and restaurants Escaz and Santa Ana offer.

address: ["Lumina Home @ Cariari \u2013 Ciudad Cariari", " Cariari", " Heredia Province"]
description: Set in the prestigious community of Ciudad Cariari, Lumina Home is a remarkable single-level residence designed for those who appreciate bold architecture, open layouts, and elegant entertaining spaces. With approximately 11, 250 ft of interior construction and sitting on a 0.84-acre lot, this fully independent property is strategically located in Cariari, in the province of Heredia. Cariari is perfectly positioned between San Jos and the Juan Santamara International Airport. Known for its lush landscapes, quiet ambiance, and easy access to key business and commercial zones like Lindora and Beln, it remains one of the most established and desirable neighborhoods for luxury living.From the moment you arrive, Lumina Home makes a statement. A wide, elegant driveway leads to an imposing double-door entrance, flanked by tall columns. Inside, the home opens to triple-height ceilings, expansive windows, and a layout that blends indoor elegance with outdoor living.The social area is the heart of the home, featuring a central living room, two additional sitting areas, a custom-designed bar, and an open kitchen with water-resistant melamine cabinetry. A formal dining room can be closed off with glass doors for added versatility. Full-height glass walls bathe the space in natural light and open completely to the garden, creating a seamless flow for entertaining and daily living. A secondary chefs kitchen adds privacy and convenience for hosting.Just a few steps down from the main social area, a cozy family TV room offers a more intimate space for relaxed evenings. The private wing features three spacious bedrooms, each with en-suite bathrooms and walk-in closets. The primary suite stands out with its generous size, large bathroom with double vanities and soaking tub. Also equipped with electric curtains for added comfort.The home also includes a guest bedroom with private bath, a dedicated office, a playroom, and two visitor bathrooms, one of which is full, perfectly positioned for future pool installation. Additionally, there are three storage rooms, staff quarters with two bedrooms, and a laundry room.The expansive exterior offers beautifully maintained gardens, with plenty of room for a future pool. A covered garage for four vehicles is complemented by extra parking for guests. Other features include a backup generator, a mezzanine with elevator, and a full home security system.Cariari is known for its lush greenery, peaceful surroundings, and mild climate, averaging 7582F during the day and cooler evenings year-round. The community is home to the Cariari Country Club, which features an 18-hole golf course, tennis courts, and dining options. The property enjoys a great location near the clubhouse and amenities at La Hacienda, an exclusive residential community in the popular area of Santa Ana on the west side of San Jos, Costa Rica.A U-shaped driveway guides past manicured gardens with tropical palm trees and green shrub hedges, priming for the refreshing air that characterizes the house. The foyer divides into the private and social areas of The Tenuan Haus, the latter featuring high ceilings and porcelain floors. It has an open space offering living and dining rooms, and a semi divided kitchen with sliding doors.The Tenuan Haus opens through glass sliding doors to the garden. This space is enclosed by a shrub hedge and metal mesh, making it ideal for pets and for social events due to its great privacy. Beautiful mountain and sunset views can be admired from the terrace and are incorporated into the indoor social area.The Tenuan Haus kitchen is distributed around a central kitchen island and includes custom wood cabinets and stainless-steel appliances. The area is equipped with a spacious pantry room and large sliding windows that add a fresh feel. Through sliding doors the kitchen area conveniently connects to the dining room.The private area of The Tenuan Haus is preceded by a well-lit family TV room. Three secondary bedrooms follow, each with private bathroom and air conditioning. The master bedroom offers a spacious area, complemented by an ensuite two-sink bathroom and a large walk-in closet with exquisite custom made wood furniture.The house also offers a laundry area and maids quarters with an independent bathroom. Two indoor parking spaces are offered in the garage, with outside room for a couple more.La Hacienda in Santa Ana is an exclusive residential community that offers a clubhouse with BBQ area and swimming pool, and sports amenities that include a tennis court, gym and sauna, walking distance away from The Tenuan Haus. It has controlled access and 24/7 security, a safe and family-friendly condominium near top-ranked schools, delicious restaurants and shopping malls ton he western part of Costa Rica's capital city of San Jos.

address: ["Modern Heights Apartment @ Guachipel\u00edn \u2013 Dukana", " Guachipelin", " San Jos\u00e9 Province"]
description: Located within the renowned Dukana residential community in Guachipeln, Escaz, this apartment in the west of San Jos offers the perfect balance between contemporary design and natural surroundings. With three spacious bedrooms, two modern bathrooms, and a private balcony, the residence is filled with natural light, creating an inviting atmosphere. Refined finishes and an open layout make it an ideal space for both family living and entertaining.Upon entering, youre greeted by an open-concept social area where the spaces flow naturally from one to another: first the kitchen with a breakfast bar, followed by the dining room, and finally the living room, all integrated into one continuous space. Oversized glass sliding doors open to the terrace, allowing abundant natural light and fresh air throughout the home. The terrace features glass railings that provide unblocked views and enhance the sense of openness.The primary bedroom mirrors this design philosophy, with large sliding glass doors that open directly to a balcony and offer green views. The secondary bedrooms are bright and well-ventilated, each with large windows that bring in natural light. A cozy TV room completes the private area of the apartment, offering a comfortable space for family time.Dukana is one of Escazs most desirable residential communities, thoughtfully designed to integrate urban convenience with lush natural surroundings. Set across 27, 500 m of land, including more than 3, 500 m preserved for reforestation, the community offers a peaceful and private environment while remaining just minutes from international schools, upscale shopping centers, gourmet restaurants, and top medical facilities. Its strategic location ensures quick access to Route 27, connecting residents effortlessly with both San Jos and the Pacific coast.Residents enjoy a wide range of resort-style amenities, including a heated swimming pool with lap lane, childrens pool, fully equipped fitness center, clubhouse, BBQ areas, and landscaped gardens. The community also features playgrounds and a pet park, creating a family-friendly environment supported by 24/7 security and controlled access for total peace of mind.More than just a residence, Modern Heights Apartment @ Guachipeln represents a lifestyle of comfort, sophistication, and exclusivity in one of Costa Ricas most coveted neighborhoods. Its a rare opportunity to live surrounded by nature while enjoying the essence of modern luxury living in Escaz.

description: Impressive contemporary two-story property with avant-garde architectural design. Casa Magenta offers a lifestyle in balance with nature and exclusive amenities in a high-security environment. The home is characterized by its unique and original design, surrounded by a dream landscaped garden. Additionally, Casa Magenta offers a separate office space with hardwood floors, which could easily be converted to a fourth bedroom as it has a full bathroom nearby.The exterior of Casa Magenta is truly spectacular. Casa Magenta combines modern design, comfort and natural beauty with great attention to detail and an exclusive location - a house as versatile as it is original!

["Contemporary Home @ V\u00eda Cipres \u2013 Condominio V\u00eda Cipres", " Curridabat", " San Jos\u00e9"]
description: Contemporary Home @ Va Ciprs is one of the few modern-style residences within this established gated community in Curridabat. Its location is unbeatable: directly across from Aleste shopping center and Clnica Bblica, with quick access via Circunvalacin, San Pedro, or Tres Ros. The property features four bedrooms, each with a private bathroom, interconnected social areas with double-height ceilings, a fully remodeled kitchen, and a private garden with a central deck, perfect for enjoying outdoor moments in privacy.Distributed across two levels, the home stands out for its functional layout and natural light. Upon entry, the open-concept design creates an airy and cohesive feel across the living room, dining area, and kitchen, all sharing the same generous space.The kitchen, recently renovated, offers a blend of elegance and warmth. It includes a central island that serves both as a prep area and seating space, black countertops for a sleek contrast, and wood-toned cabinetry that adds texture and balance. Its a space that is both refined and practical for everyday living.On the main floor, there's also a bedroom with a full bathroom, ideal for guests or use as a private home office. Large sliding glass doors connect the indoor spaces to the garden and a central deck designed for BBQs or outdoor lounging. The deck sits at the center of the patio, framed by green areas on both sides for added privacy and a sense of calm.A staircase along one side of the living room leads to the second level, where youll find three additional bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms. The primary suite features a walk-in closet, and all rooms offer generous proportions and natural light.Curridabat is one of the most desirable residential areas in San Joss eastern corridor. Its established infrastructure, top-ranked private schools, and proximity to universities like UCR, UACA, Universidad Latina, and Santa Paula make it a sought-after location. Shopping centers such as Multiplaza del Este and Plaza del Sol, recreational clubs like the Indoor Club, and the growing culinary and lifestyle scene in Pinares add to the areas appeal, offering residents a connected, dynamic lifestyle just outside the city center.This home offers space, light, and a strong connection to the outdoors, all in a strategic location with immediate access to key services.

address: ["Casa Rioca in Santa Ana \u2013 Piedades", " Santa Ana", " San Jos\u00e9"]
description: Casa Rioca is a wonderful two-level home in Santa Ana. The house offers an integrated social area with double-height ceilings, marble floors and a great distribution that seems to integrate the large and open terrace and gardens. Casa Rioca has a great Santa Ana location within the private residential community of Bosques del Ro.Casa Riocas main door opens to a welcoming foyer with marble floors. A grand circular staircase characterizes the area and accents the foyer before leading towards the indoor garden and social areas.The main social area of Casa Rioca is a semi-integrated space with living and dining roo. The dining room is framed by a stone wall and both areas have indirect lighting with custom ceiling design. Through wall to wall glass sliding doors, the social area can integrate entirely to the terrace, ensuring a fresh feel and plenty of natural ventilation. The terrace is a covered yet open space that precedes the garden which includes multiple palm trees and a wonderful deck that creates a less formal ambience.The terrace conveniently connects to the kitchen through a single door. The kitchen revolves around a large and extremely practical central kitchen island with prep sink. Custom Materia Prima wood cabinets in the kitchen are covered by white countertops, creating a contemporary design with plenty of the natural light thanks to the large window facing the garden. The kitchen is also equipped with stainless steel appliances and a large pantry room.The main level also includes a great home office.Back in the foyer, the curved staircase blends marble steps with aluminum and glass railing leading all the way up to the private area. A central family TV room with balcony precedes the bedrooms and creates a great spot for casual family gathering. Three secondary bedrooms each include their own walk-in closet, bathroom and garden views. One of them has a balcony and all of them boast wood flooring. The master bedroom has access to a private balcony, fine wood floors and a beautiful ensuite bathroom enhanced by stone walls and his and hers sinks.Casa Rioca in Santa Ana also includes maids quarters and laundry area. Its garage has room for two cars and outside space for a couple more. The house is also equipped with a smart audio and security system.Bosques del Ro boasts a clubhouse, soccer field, swimming pool and plenty of green areas. Its clubhouse offers a kitchen, a large dining room and games room. Casa Rioca is located in the tranquil area of Santa Ana, near top-quality restaurants, best ranked schools and every service or store you might need just a couple of minutes away.

["Casa Relax in La Hacienda \u2013 La Hacienda", " Santa Ana", " San Jos\u00e9"]
description: Ideal for entertaining and tranquil living, Casa Relax radiates a heartwarming air in the exclusive community of La Hacienda. This family home boasts a unique distribution with large sliding glass doors that can integrate the kitchen, living room and a spacious terrace into a grand social area. Upstairs, Casa Relax offers three bedrooms, each with a private bathroom, walk-in closet and balcony, are offered. Casa Relax and its concrete walls, vaulted ceilings and smooth detailing await you in an 862me lot in one of Santa Anas most sought residential areas.Surrounded by a gentle, exotic garden and boasting exposed concrete walls part of its contemporary design, the entrance to Casa Relax greets guests with beautiful wood beams and a double-wide door. It opens to a foyer with large Doninelli concrete tiles with stone pebbles separating each other. Taking a right will connect you to the guest bathroom with delicate finishes such as a suspended, wood counter and a delicate, stone basin.The most notable area of Casa Relax is its kitchen and social area. The first offers Dica furniture and a rectangular isolated countertop right alongside a breakfast bar that can sit four people. Right next to this area, a breakfast or informal dining room integrates with the kitchen. Both open through Durman, glass, sliding doors to Casa Relaxs terrace, adding a sense of freshness and ample spacing to the kitchen.The terrace boasts an open and roofed design that creates a calming, natural vibe. This deck-style area has welcoming wood floors and great ventilation provided by the gardens presence and an audio system, ideal for entertainment. Two steps down the, a smaller and less formal living room boasts concrete walls and floors, and connects to Casa Relaxs indoor social area.Exposed wood beams, a vaulted and open design in the ceilings, and concrete walls boast the contemporary design and fresh feel that characterizes the indoor social area of Casa Relax. A living and dining room are situated in this area, with access through glass sliding doors to the terrace, and fantastic natural light.Elegant slabs of wood suspended in the air make up the staircase, framed by a large window with a wood frame that incorporates green views into the house, that connects to the upper level. Doninelli wood-imitation floors in the upper floor greet guests into the private area. Three bedrooms, each with their own bathroom, balcony and walk-in closet are offered. A well-lit family TV room is also located in this part of Casa Relax.The master suite at boasts a unique bathroom, with a dual-sink sitting on beige, quartz countertop, and marble floors. An open rain shower with a stunning detailed wall and a large walk-in closet, are the cherry on top of Casa Relaxs master bedroom. Casa Relax has a garage with space for two cars and outside space for several more. The house offers a laundry and service area with multiple storage rooms. Like other houses in La Hacienda in Santa Ana, the owners of Casa Relax may enjoy the great comforts this exclusive community offers, including a multi-use clubhouse, gym, playground, tennis court and swimming pool. La Hacienda offers triple security, controlled access and continuous surveillance, creating a very safe community.

description: Recently remodeled luxury residence that perfectly combines modern elegance with practical design. The Argento Apartment @ Monteplata offers an outstanding living experience. This exclusive high-rise apartment is located in the Monteplata community in Jaboncillos, Escaz, known for its tranquility, convenience, and proximity to essential services and top schools.Upon entering the apartment through the elevator, you are welcomed into an open-concept living area that serves as the heart of the home. The spacious layout integrates the living and dining spaces with a beautifully detailed, modern kitchen. The design ensures a clear distinction between each area while maintaining a cohesive flow. The elegant kitchen features high-end appliances, sleek cabinetry, and two islandsone designed for cooking and another serving as an informal breakfast bar.Adding to the social appeal of the apartment, a stylish bar area with faux wood cabinetry and marbled black countertops enhances the space, making it perfect for entertaining guests. The living area extends to a small balcony with a charming brick finish, offering breathtaking views of the surrounding hills and cityscape.The Argento Apartment features three generously sized bedrooms with beautiful views, including a serene master suite with a spacious walk-in closet. The master bathroom boasts an exceptional design, with a large window that invites natural light and offers stunning views. A bathtub positioned beside the window and double sinks complete this luxurious space. The secondary bathroom also features a tub and double sinksan uncommon and convenient feature for families or guests. The community offers a hilltop location where residents can enjoy a clubhouse, a lap pool, a basketball court, a playground, a tennis court, and a fully equipped gym. Jaboncillos, Escaz is a highly sought-after neighborhood that combines the convenience of urban living with a peaceful, private environment. The area is close to top-ranked schools, fine dining establishments, boutique stores, and high-quality services, ensuring that everything you need is within easy reach.The Argento Apartment @ Monteplata offers a blend of comfort, sophistication, and stunning surroundings, making it an exceptional choice for modern living in one of Escaz's most prestigious communities.

address: ["Casa Magna in Monter\u00e1n \u2013 Monter\u00e1n", " Curridabat", " San Jos\u00e9"]
description: Warm contemporary luxury with mountain views. Casa Magna in Montern is an impressive family home with a transitional luxury design blend that combines modern and traditional elements surrounded by impeccable detailing and manicured gardens. This smart home incorporates luxury styling with world-class technology for audio and lighting as well as security. The two-story Casa Magna home in Montern offers comfort and style on a 2000m2 property located in one of the most exclusive residential communities in Costa Rica on the western side of San Jos. A winding stone driveway leads up to the covered entrance at Casa Magna. Step into luxury through a 3-meter high hardwood entrance to the great hall. Casa Magna was built to enjoy and entertain whether youre planning an evening with the family or a larger activity with friends. The main social area integrates two living rooms, including large open spaces with textured material design, a full-service bar, an inviting fireplace, world-class audio and lighting technology, floor to ceiling windows and sliding doors with soothing garden views. Elegant cedar wood sliding doors integrate or separate the formal dining room with the rest of the grand social area. Casa Magna also includes a beautiful home-office on the first floor.A key feature at Casa Magna, the meticulously designed and maintained gardens offer peaceful views and offer an ideal combination of outdoor and indoor entertainment. The backyard includes an outdoor terrace with jacuzzi and sunbathing area, as well as a large independent entertainment area with BBQ and private bathroom. Above this covered terrace, Casa Magna boasts a stunning outdoor terrace that connects with the private area of the home on the second floor. This outdoor terrace boasts an outdoor fire pit and stunning mountain views and views of the Iraz volcano. The kitchen at Casa Magna boasts Santos quartz counters and contemporary functional design equally suited for food preparation and for entertaining. The kitchen incorporates plenty of sunlight and garden views as well as an informal central kitchen island for informal sharing. The private area of the home is located on the second floor and pivots around a central family room that can double as a study area. Casa Magna boasts four full bedrooms, each with hardwood floors, private bathrooms, and large windows with garden and city views. The large master bedroom also offers impressive mountain views, a comfortable walk-in closet, and en-suite bathroom with marble floors, a wonderful shower and jacuzzi .Casa Magna in Montern includes a full service area with maids quarters, an independent bathroom and service area for home and garden maintenance, a two car garage with additional parking for up to five vehicles, and a secondary service entrance in the rear of the property. The home was designed to incorporate an elevator which can easily be added for future owners who will also enjoy all the comfort and style of living in one of the premiere houses in Montern. This exclusive residential community incorporates triple security, two swimming pools, tennis courts, the well-known Montern golf course, gym, yoga studio, and plenty of hiking and playground areas throughout the community.

address: ["Sue\u00f1os de Golf @ Valle del Sol \u2013 Valle del Sol", " Santa Ana", " San Jos\u00e9"]
description: Sueos de Golf @ Valle del Sol is a spacious and well-designed home with a warm and functional layout, available for rent in one of the most exclusive residential communities on the west side of San Jos, Costa Ricas capital. This five-bedroom home features a heated pool, a covered terrace with built-in BBQ area, and a beautiful garden. It is located in Valle del Sol, a secure gated community in Santa Ana known for its professional golf course, expansive green areas, and strategic location near top schools, services, and shopping centers.Upon entering, the home welcomes you with a foyer that serves as the central hub of the house. The main social area includes the living and dining room, which open through sliding glass doors to a covered terrace with a built-in sink, ideal for outdoor dining and entertaining. Just beyond, the private garden and heated swimming pool are surrounded by greenery, offering a private oasis for residents.The kitchen is adjacent to the social area and features air conditioning, a central island, space for a breakfast nook, and a pantry. On this level youll also find the laundry area, maids quarters with full bath, and a covered garage for two vehicles.Off to the side of the foyer is a versatile room that can be used as a guest bedroom or home office, with a full bathroom right across the hall that also serves as the guest bath.Upstairs, a central family TV room with air conditioning connects three secondary bedrooms, each with its own full bathroom, built-in closets, and travertine countertops. The spacious primary suite features a private balcony, A/C, a large en-suite bathroom with double sinks, a shower, and a soaking tub. It also offers a generous walk-in closet and an additional linen closet.Valle del Sol is the largest gated residential community in Costa Ricas Central Valley, covering more than 147 hectares and offering a renowned golf and tennis complex. With miles of nature trails, beautifully maintained green spaces, and 24/7 security, its an ideal place to raise a family. The community is close to Vindi and Fresh Market supermarkets, top-tier schools like Saint Jude and Pan-American School, and entertainment hubs such as Terrazas Lindora.The area is also surrounded by fine dining options and major business centers like Forum I and II. Quick access to Route 27 connects you easily to Escaz, downtown Santa Ana, or even the Pacific coast, just an hour away.Sueos de Golf offers spacious interiors, cross ventilation, and abundant natural light in every room, ideal for families seeking comfort, privacy, and well-designed indoor and outdoor living.

address: ["Single-level Stillness Home in Granadilla \u2013 Granadilla", " San Jos\u00e9", " San Jos\u00e9"]
description: This single-level 5-bedroom home in Granadilla awaits a large family looking to enjoy the expansive 0.8-acre property and amenities. The Granadilla Stillness Home seems to pause time and take you through the peace and quiet of its expansive gardens that surround the home. Distributed over one single-level, this spacious and heart-warming property offers a stunning terrace, refreshing pool, an outdoor independent lounging area, and more, all in the centric area of Granadilla on the eastern side of San Jos, Costa RicaThe Granadilla Stillness Home bursts in natural light from the moment you step in. Walking in through the solid wood door, youll find the semi-integrated living and dining rooms boasting an original design that creates two separate spaces that connect in their own way. This area flows to the homes bar which presents a classical look with wooden details and a cozy chimney, perfect for entertaining guests or having an intimate moment with your family.From the bar, glass doors open up to The Stillness Homes terrace, where you can enjoy the view of the beautiful landscaped garden, full of mature trees and extensive grass areas. On the other side of the house, youll find a spacious kitchen with a warm, classical design and wooden cabinets. The private area of the home is also found in this area, offering 5 bedrooms with closets and wide windows for natural light and a fresh breeze.Outside of the home, the green areas are complemented by a large pool that leads to a private clubhouse. Here, an extra dining room, terrace, chimney, and BBQ area provide an escape for contemplation. However, it also creates a prime entertainment hub with every type of space for the entire family, allowing gatherings full of fun amenities and privacy from the rest of the property.The Granadilla Stillness Home comes with three and a half bathrooms, as well as 4 covered parking spaces and 6 exterior ones. Nestled in Granadilla, on the outskirts of the capital city of San Jos, offers a unique blend of urban convenience and a peaceful suburban atmosphere. Residents enjoy the accessibility of the city's restaurants, educational institutions, healthcare facilities, and shopping centers, catering to various needs. The area still maintains a tranquil lifestyle surrounded by nature, yet is positioned just a few minutes from the center of San Jos. The Granadilla Stillness Home offers a unique opportunity to live a tranquil lifestyle in a large property with outstanding private amenities, all with the convenience of proximity to the lively city.

address: ["The Secret Garden Home at Monter\u00e1n \u2013 Monter\u00e1n", " Curridabat", " San Jos\u00e9"]
description: Double height ceilings, exposed wooden beams, cedar wood finishes and glass-sliding doors characterize the beautiful design of The Secret Garde Home at Montern. Surrounded by a landscaped garden visible from every area of the house, the property boasts exceptional privacy due to its unique location in a large 2, 983m2 lot. The house offers a great social and private area distribution that includes a bar area, formal living room, gym and study room. Secret Garden Home awaits you in Montern, a sought-after residential & golf community in the eastern part of San Jos.A paved driveway with delicate shrub hedges at either side curves through the landscaped gardens into the soothing privacy that Secret Garden Home at Montern offers. Wood doors elegantly welcome guests to the foyer with double-height ceilings, and connects to the vast and multi-purpose social area of the house.Secret Garden Home at Monterns social area consists of three main rooms that are naturally lit and boast a refreshing ambience due to ever-present garden views. Cedar wood floors delimit a formal living room that radiates warmth and comfort, with the fine wood ceilings shared by all of the social area. Next to the living room, a bar area integrates to a secondary living room that boasts glass sliding doors with beautiful garden views. Brick columns and walls add a rustic and inviting touch to this delightful part of the house.Granite countertops, smoke extractor, high ceilings and a central kitchen island are some of the features that make Secret Garden Homes kitchen ideal for entertaining family and friends. A corridor connects to a separate breakfast area boasting a glass sliding door that opens to the garden and expansive windows. The area has a vaulted ceiling with brick detailing and many small, square windows that complement the already ample spacing it offers.Parallel to the main social area, Secret Garden Home at Montern offers a one-of-a-kind formal dining room. Cedar floors and wood ceilings frame an elegant space that is further enhanced by the wood detailing in the red walls. One corner of the dining room boasts an L-shaped and expansive window that incorporates green views and natural light to the room, and another connects to the kitchen.The first floor of Secret Garden Home also offers a guest bathroom, a multi-purpose room with a mirror wall (currently used as a gym) and a TV or meeting room with a delicately crafted, built-in furniture and wood, sliding doors that provide excellent privacy.A delicate wood staircase winds up to Secret Garden Homes private area in the second floor. Three bedrooms with cedar wood floors are offered, each with a private walk-in closet and bathroom with marble detailing. The two secondary bedrooms share a fantastic balcony and terrace with steel railing and a brick structure accessed through glass sliding doors.The master bedroom boasts a large space with a personal living room and a luxurious bathroom with an L-shaped counter with double sink, bathtub and walk-in closet. address: ["The City Views Residence \u2013 San Rafael", " Escaz\u00fa", " San Jos\u00e9"]
description: In the vibrant heart of San Rafael de Escaz lies The City Views Residence, an apartment where urban life meets tranquil privacy. Perched in one of the most coveted areas of the country, this large 3-bedroom apartment offers a unique living experience, where every window frames breathtaking views of the city below. Its neutral finishes and high-quality materials allow for a versatile style, easily adapting to either contemporary or classic decor.The allure of The City Views Residence begins the moment you step inside, with its floor-to-ceiling windows and glass doors that bathe the entire space in natural light, creating an ambiance that is both bright and inviting. Its living spaces are thoughtfully arranged, allowing for seamless interaction between the living room, dining area, and modern kitchen. These areas flow effortlessly into one another, making it an entertainer's dream. Hosting becomes a joy in this apartment, where the kitchen is always within reach, yet discreetly positioned to maintain the elegance of the social spaces. The true jewel of The City Views Residence apartment is its expansive terrace, which wraps around much of the residence. This outdoor space, with its sleek glass and metal railing, offers an uninterrupted panorama of the citya perfect backdrop for any gathering or a quiet moment of reflection.The private quarters of City View Apartment offer ample and luminous bedrooms. The master suite features a spacious layout, a generously sized walk-in closet, and an en-suite bathroom that exudes luxury, complete with a soaking tub. The master bedroom opens onto a terrace, providing a peaceful retreat. The secondary bedrooms are also spacious and light-filled, with one offering direct access to the balcony. These rooms are ideal for family or guests, sharing a comfortable bathroom.The City View Residence offers more than just beautiful living spaces. It includes practical amenities such as a laundry room, two secure parking spaces, an elevator for ease of access, and round-the-clock security. The building itself caters to every lifestyle with a range of facilities, including a small gym, a refreshing outdoor pool, and a relaxing saunaensuring that City View Apartment truly has something for everyone.Located in the thriving area of San Rafael de Escaz, The City Views Residence provides not only a truly inviting living space but also an enviable location. Known for its economic vitality, San Rafael offers a perfect blend of urban convenience and suburban tranquility. The area is well-connected by Highway 27, linking you effortlessly to commercial centers, top medical facilities, and prestigious educational institutions.With its stunning city views, versatile design, and thoughtful amenities, this residence offers a place where every detail enhances the living experience in Escaz, arguably Costa Ricas most sought-after living area.

address: ["Single-level Mountainview at Monteran \u2013 Monteran", " Curridabat", " San Jos\u00e9"]
description: Single-level mountainside comfort in Montern. This unique 5382 sq.ft. house offers an exquisite material and luxury detail selection, designed to have the versatility to adjust to its owners choice of decoration. Unique Mountain View Home was carefully designed for all family needs including relaxation and gathering areas for meeting up with family and friends, as well as abundant presence of air and natural light flow in every space. Located in what is considered the best luxury gated community of the area, Unique Mountain View Home is characterized by its 360 jaw-dropping panoramic views of the Central Valley mountains, forest and city. It is part of the 2800 m2 property destined to be an exclusive private lookout, discreetly found as an area for peace, rest and serenity with easy access.A U shaped cobblestone private road leads to this gorgeous house, one which starts to peek through its frontal beautifully landscaped gardens. Relaxing sounds coming from the rock fountain give a warm welcome to Unique Mountain View Home, blending with the residences alluring facade. Its driveway features Romanesque columns and the exteriors windows are outlined with delicate white frames, including a detailed white arch on the entrance. At the entrance, an elegant hall with a triple-height ceiling and a dome at the top form a diamond, creating a unique division of the house into two main spaces. The social area is located on the right, which can be accessed through a corridor that guides to an open design living room and formal dining room. A stunning chimney gives a spark to the area, reflecting on the lustrous flooring the home has to offer. From the dining room, glass sliding doors framed in wood give way to an exclusive play area for adults, great for a fun night with friends. Another glass sliding door opens up to a covered terrace from where you can enjoy the vast, irresistible backyard full of colorful flowers, mature trees and tropical plants- truly a gardeners dream. It also features an area built high enough to enjoy privacy and striking views.A discreet door in the hallway that leads to Unique Mountain View Homes shared area gives access to the private and separate lovely kitchen. Its wooden cabinets give the area a classic touch, modernized through its fabulous granite countertops. This spacious room also features an informal dining area and even an interior garden with a personalized mural that brings life and brightness to it.The private are of Unique Mountain View Home is located on the other side of the residence, to the left of the receiving hallway. After passing by the quaint guest bathroom, a door leads to a private and ample TV or resting room that overflows with light and gives way to the four bedrooms of the house. The master bedroom highlights two walk-in closets, two sinks and a private access to a large outdoor living room terrace that can be adapted into a gym or any other custom space, and also offers a jacuzzi- ideal for relaxation. The three secondary bedrooms all include private bathrooms and walk-in closets, as well as wall-sized windows that give access to the garden.Unique Mountain View Home has a large separate laundry area and complete maids quarters. The entire house has vegetation and offers crossed ventilation throughout. It is located in a very secure area that ends in a roundabout, ideal for privacy and for parking space- it includes two garage spaces, two extra covered ones, and four on the cobblestone road that surrounds the house and assures a private entrance and exit. The property enjoys all the benefits of life within Montern, on the east side of San Jos, Costa Rica, including access to the only private golf course in eastern San Jos, wide double-width driveways within the community, a private clubhouse, two dazzling swimming pools, a gym, beautiful trails for walking, premium tennis courts and private access with triple security- a great option for family life.

address: ["The Canyon Home in Ciudad Col\u00f3n \u2013 Cuidad Col\u00f3n", " Mora", " Puntarenas"]
description: This beautifully remodeled home, nestled in a picturesque residential community in Ciudad Coln, offers a tranquil lifestyle with stunning views of a green canyon and the soothing sounds of a nearby flowing river. The Canyon Home is located within a premiere gated community on the west side of San Jos, known for its traditional charm and peaceful ambiance, making this an ideal location for those seeking serenity without sacrificing access to essential amenities in the heart of Costa Rica's Central Valley.The Canyon Home design and setting allow its residents to immerse themselves in nature while enjoying the comfort of a contemporary home, blending classic and modern details. Soaring ceilings welcome you to The Canyon House, along with an expansive living and dining area that feels bright and spacious. The open-concept layout flows seamlessly into a glassed-in terrace that frames beautiful views of the surrounding greenery. The terrace naturally extends the indoor living space, inviting fresh breezes and the beauty of the canyon into the home. Large glass doors invite you to step outside and enjoy the garden, making the transition between indoor and outdoor living effortless. Whether for entertaining or quiet relaxation, this space captures the serenity of the natural surroundings.The kitchen on the main floor features sleek black marble countertops with striking white veining that extend across the backsplash and the large central island. The island not only provides ample workspace but also serves as an ideal spot for casual dining or entertaining. Clean, white cabinetry contrasts beautifully with the dark countertops, creating a minimalist yet sophisticated design. The kitchen area is filled with natural light from the large window overlooking the lush greenery outside, enhancing the bright and airy atmosphere. Additionally, it connects to a spacious service and laundry area, ensuring practicality.The private areas of The Canyon Home begin on the main floor, where youll find a versatile bedroom that can also serve as a home office. It is conveniently located next to a full bathroom, providing added convenience for guests or those who may need a private workspace. The second floor opens to a cozy family room, ideal for relaxation or watching TV. This floor houses three bedrooms, each offering its own unique charm. The master suite stands out with its balcony, offering breathtaking views of the lush green tropical surroundings. The master suite also includes a spacious walk-in closet and a beautifully designed bathroom. One of the secondary bedrooms features its own ensuite bathroom, offering privacy and comfort. The third bedroom shares an adjacent full bathroom, which also serves as a guest bathroom for the family room area, making it both practical and well-suited for visitors or family members. Sunlight floods each room, enhancing the bright and welcoming atmosphere on this level.Ciudad Coln is one of the few areas in San Jos that still embodies the essence of a traditional Costa Rican town. Known for its laid-back, peaceful atmosphere and strong sense of community, this charming district offers a lifestyle that blends tranquility with convenience with sunny weather year-round. Access to Ciudad Coln is easy through Highway 27, only a 15-minute drive from vibrant areas like Lindora and Guachipeln, where youll find top-ranked schools, shopping centers, restaurants, and other urban amenities.With its spacious interiors, stunning views of a green canyon, and the peaceful sound of a nearby river, this beautifully remodeled home is an ideal retreat from the hustle and bustle of city life just minutes away from key urban areas.

address: ["Elevate Apartment in Escaz\u00fa \u2013 Dukana", " Escaz\u00fa", " San Jos\u00e9"]

address: ["Furnished Casa Natura @ Santa Ana \u2013 Lomas Del Valle", " Santa Ana", " San Jos\u00e9"]
description: Fully furnished contemporary home with hints of classic romanesque tradition. Casa Natura is a spacious 360 m2 house perfect for a small family, offering 2 bedrooms and a total of 1250 m2 of terrain. Casa Natura is characterized by its integration of different prime materials, such as fine woods, stone and brick that give the home a unique, warm feel. It is located in the gated community of Lomas del Valle in Santa Ana, just 5 minutes from downtown and featuring resort-like amenities on the west side of San Jos, Costa Rica.Casa Naturas facade is a sober blend of a modern design and tropical delight. Its landscaped front yard is combined with more mature, wilder vegetation that creates the perfect contrast with the home's champaign color and stone details. It also presents a water feature and a vine covered wall that give headway into Casa Natura and its open shared areas.Casa Naturas living and dining rooms are integrated in an open design. Its wooden frames, furniture and details complement the centerpiece of the house- its magnificent triple-height brick vaulted ceiling, illuminated from the top. This gives the space a romanesque touch, unique like no other, and is also brightened up with natural light during the day. The area, which includes a guest bathroom, also opens up to a large terrace through glass sliding doors with access to the beautiful yard and natural views.This same space holds Casa Naturas kitchen, one that is unified with a spacious tv room or workspace. The kitchen also features an ample island for cooking and first-class granite countertops.Casa Natura offers two full bedrooms. The first one is located on the first floor and is modern and spacious. It opens up to a terrace, and also includes a walk-in closet, a private bathroom and even an internal garden. The master bedroom is on the second level, beside the library/tv room. It features a master bathroom and a balcony with beautiful views. Both bedrooms are characterized by their large windows, natural lighting and refined wooden flooring.Casa Natura Santa Ana has a laundry room and maids quarters, but they are built separately from the house to ensure the maximum privacy possible. Casa Natura is located in Lomas del Valle, an exclusive urbanization surrounded by mountains that create the ultimate relaxing experience. It offers security and resort-like amenities such as tennis courts, pools, a gym and clubhouse. It is also five minutes away from downtown Santa Ana and Escaz with high-end services such as gourmet cuisine, supermarkets, medical care, shopping malls and top-tier education facilities. This is the perfect private oasis to bring into your life.

address: ["The Avenue Apartment in Escazu \u2013 Avenida Escaz\u00fa", " Escaz\u00fa", " San Jos\u00e9"]
description: The Avenue Apartment in Escaz offers modern, functional living in one of the most desirable locations in the Central Valley. Situated in the newest tower of Avenida Escaz, this two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment is available for rent and is an ideal choice for those seeking comfort, convenience, and an urban lifestyle in a premium setting.The apartment features an open-concept layout where the kitchen, living, and dining areas flow together into one cohesive space. Finishes are neutral and sophisticated, making it easy to adapt the decor to different styles. From the main living area, sliding glass doors open to a balcony with beautiful views of the Escaz mountains, perfect for enjoying natural light and the area's mild climate.Both bedrooms have windows that allow for excellent ventilation and natural light. The layout also includes a separate laundry area and, on a different floor, covered parking for two vehicles.Living in Avenida Escaz means being part of one of Costa Ricas premier mixed-use developments, where residential, commercial, culinary, and professional spaces are thoughtfully integrated. Residents enjoy access to a wide range of high-end shops, restaurants, cultural venues, and essential services, all within walking distance.The buildings amenities include a swimming pool, gym, valet parking, EV charging stations, and a park with walking paths and playgrounds.With direct access to Route 27, the apartment is also just minutes from other shopping centers such as Plaza Tempo, Multiplaza, and Plaza Itskatz. Prestigious schools like Blue Valley are only 10 minutes away, and the Texas Tech University campus is located within Avenida Escaz. Hospitals like CIMA, and major retailers including Pricesmart and Office Depot, are also a short walk away.The Avenue Apartment in Escaz is a rare opportunity to live with comfort and convenience, right in the heart of one of Costa Ricas most complete urban communities.

address: ["Casa Colorida in Valle del Sol \u2013 Valle del Sol", " Santa Ana", " San Jos\u00e9"]
description: Flawless entertainment in a classically detailed home. Casa Colorida in Valle del Sol is a two-level property with multiple water features and plenty of social areas meant to share and entertain. The house enjoys unique details including fountains, stone finishes and arched windows that generate a sense of warmth with naturally lit spaces. Casa Colorida includes two special areas for entertainment: a heated pool area overlooking a beautiful canyon and the open terrace for BBQ and sports watching in the upper floor. The property enjoys the safety and amenities of Valle del Sol, a safe residential and golf community in Santa Ana, west of Escaz and San Jos.Casa Coloridas faade creates a stunning first impression. The central fountain with three giant vases forms a roundabout with lots of parking space. The front of the house presents arched windows, stone detailing and a landscaped garden that welcomes residents and visitors to a special home. Two round columns frame the entrance to the foyer, highlighted by a curved brick ceiling. The main door opens to a hallway that ends with one of Casa Coloridas main highlights. An imposing and wide stone wall extends to a triple height, boasting decorative planters and a soothing fountain with two lanterns at each side. The fountain is surrounded by an internal refreshing garden, and round columns that support the ceiling.Boasting wood floors and several arched windows overlooking the terrace, the living room of Casa Colorida offers a calm space with plenty of natural light. The area offers a brick chimney and its ceilings are decorated with wood moldings, a distinguishing feature present in most of the houses areas. Casa Colorida in Valle del Sols dining room offers a more intimate space, with wood floors and a window facing the front of the house. Connected to the dining room, the kitchen is an ample area featuring black granite countertops, backsplash and brand-new Kitchen Aid appliances. A central counter with a secondary sink is offered. The TV area integrates to the kitchens breakfast counter, a room surrounded by garden views.The kitchen and the living rooms both open to the terrace. This is an open space with terracota floors, round columns and built-in furniture with a custom bar countertop. Directly in front, the swimming pool and jacuzzi offer a refreshing sight and nature-filled area. Rock decorations and a stone fountain overlook the canyon and its lush nature. To one side of the swimming pool, a secondary terrace incorporates the pools garden into a double-height and vaulted ceiling with exposed wood beams. Sliding windows open to a wood lookout. The other side of the garden connects through stone stairs to another peaceful lookout.Still on the main level, the office space near the foyer offers a spacious room that can become a guest bedroom with the nearby full bathroom. It has another door that conveniently connects to the terrace and pool area. Casa Coloridas upper level is home to the private area, connected through an elegant wood staircase framed by stained-glass skylight. You will be welcomed by a crystal chandelier, an office space and a spacious terrace. This area offers a living and dining room, a less formal space to enjoy with friends and family. Cane detailing in the ceilings and the open design provide an ideal ambience for watching sports and weekend BBQs. From an outdoor area with balustrades, you will be able to enjoy panoramic mountain views.The family quarters are located to the side of the hallway, and each include wood floors, air conditioning and access to private balconies. Two secondary bedrooms offer a wood closet, their own private bathrooms and arched windows that let natural light in. Casa Coloridas master bedroom is a haven. The master bedroom is a spacious room with an additional two walk-in closets and a luxury ensuite bathroom with two sinks opposite each other and a jacuzzi with a delicate, mosaic design. Casa Colorida also offers two wine cellars, a laundry area and a maids quarters. In addition, a storage room and outside parking for six cars. Like other houses in Valle del Sol, Casa Colorida enjoys the only golf course in the area of Santa Ana and other amenities such as tennis courts, hiking trails and a playground. The condominium is a safe neighborhood located in Pozos, near best ranked schools, exquisite restaurants and top-quality services a minutes ride away.

description: Casa Armona offers family living in harmony with inviting design, wooden features, and surrounded by green gardens. The two-level distribution includes three bedrooms with two master bedrooms and a full bedroom on the first floor. Recently remodeled, the home has a Spanish-colonial contemporary style surrounded by gardens and green areas. It is located in an ideal setting with tranquil simplicity for uncomplicated living in a gated community in Santo Domingo de Heredia, with easy access to private schools, restaurants and supermarkets. Casa Armona in Heredia enjoys a 2-level distribution where all social areas are on the ground level. The living room, dining room and kitchen combine in an open design with wooden accents, large windows and carefully chosen flooring with modern elements. The home was recently updated in 2022. The kitchens wooden cabinetry, central island and white quartz countertops give the space a contemporary touch, while the living rooms fireplace adds a sense of inviting warmth.The social areas at Casa Armona are connected to the outdoors through large glass sliding doors that integrate the open terrace, characterized by exposed wood columns and beams. address: ["Country Estate in Escaz\u00fa \u2013 San Rafael", " Escaz\u00fa", " San Jos\u00e9"]
description: Estate living in exclusive Escaz location. Surrounded by one hectare of landscaped, well-kept and mature gardens, Country Estate in Escaz will awe you with its grand architecture, amazing pool area and unique features. The sloped terrain of the property allows for constant enchanting garden views from wherever you are. Marble floors, triple-height and domed ceilings, and travertine walls are part of the distinct detailing that characterizes this three-level residence. Country Estate awaits in the center of Escaz, ready to amaze guests with grandeur and an unexpected charm.Past the secure perimeter, the main entrance to the Country Estate home opens onto the main level and a grand receiving area. This main level includes the master social area with high ceilings and two semi-integrated living rooms that seem to glow with custom lighting and natural illumination provided by large, expansive windows above the glass sliding doors to the terrace. This area boasts a delicate water wall fountain that creates a soothing sound and a travertine wall with brick detailing that gives the dining room, with access to the terrace, a more private space. An intricate travertine arch connects to the bar designed to entices with a warm brick wall and two roman columns at each side. Two sliding doors open respectively to the terrace or to one of the family TV rooms. The grand kitchen at Country Estate in Escaz revolves around a large central kitchen island with an area for dish preparation and another for sharing with casual sitting for four people. The white furniture, quartz countertops and porcelanato floors enhance the modern design of the area. Multiple windows make it perfectly lit and ventilated, combining with Viking and Frigidaire appliances to make cooking a delightful experience. In addition, a study or office space is offered in this floor.The main level offers two master bedrooms with large walk-in closets, custom lighting and A/C. Its bathroom boasts a dual sink, marble countertops and an exquisite Jacuzzi.The lower level has private entertainment areas such as a game room and an area currently used as a gym but that can easily be used as another bedroom including it's private closet and bathroom. Two massage rooms offer a complete bathroom each, along with a dressing room. This level is where the dream-like swimming pool is located. Boasting a huge size, the pool offers a Jacuzzi, two areas and a wet bar. Palm trees, stone detailing and a slide surround it. Complementary to this area, a ranch offers a BBQ, bar and a bathroom, making it a one of a kind outdoor area meant for quality entertainment.Country Estates top level, the third, is accessed up a delicately curved staircase with an iron-detailed railing and beside arched windows into a living room. Marble floors, a double-height and domed ceiling with brick detailing and a balcony overlooking the downstairs social area, creates a great sense of amplitude. Three secondary bedrooms that may well be master suites are offered. They each include ensuite bathroom with a Jacuzzi, walk-in closet, air conditioning, marble floors and a balcony. In addition, another master suite with a double bathroom and a family room with a bathroom is located in this same area. The property has a guest house suitable for caretakers or those responsible for the beauty of the lush nature and magical walking trails that surround this beautiful home. Four garages may be stored in the garage, along with thirty cars outside. Country Estate in Escaz awaits in an unmatched location, minutes away from the Costa Rica Country Club, delicious restaurants, top-ranked schools and every service you might need within reach.

Casa Aurea @ Espinal features 3 bedrooms and stands out for its clean contemporary style and elegant design. The homes faade showcases a sleek geometric structure with warm-toned finishes and stone-like textures that create character and contrast. Its double-slope roof with extended eaves offers both shade and architectural appeal.Upon entering Casa Aurea, you're greeted by a sense of space and natural light. A hallway leads first to a private office and guest bathroomideal for remote work or as an additional study. Further in, the home opens to a generous social area where the living and dining rooms connect seamlessly with a covered terrace and landscaped patio, perfect for outdoor living in complete privacy.To the side, the modern kitchen features clean white countertops, contemporary cabinetry, and a large breakfast island. It connects directly to the laundry area, which also has access to the garden, and includes a maids quarters with a full bathroomdesigned for practical and efficient daily living.The second floor of Casa Aurea is dedicated to the private family space. At the center is a cozy TV room, ideal for family gatherings. Two secondary bedrooms, filled with natural light, share a spacious bathroom with modern, neutral finishes. The master suite enjoys a prime corner location, featuring large windows, a walk-in closet, and a stylish en-suite bathroom with double sinks. This upper-level layout maintains a perfect balance between shared spaces and personal retreatideal for a growing family.Located in San Rafael de Alajuela, Hacienda Espinal is one of the Central Valleys most sought-after and well-planned communities. This gated residential development offers a peaceful, semi-rural setting just minutes from urban conveniences in Escaz and Santa Ana. With direct access to Route 27, residents enjoy quick connectivity to San Jos, Juan Santamara International Airport, and the Pacific Coast.Hacienda Espinal is designed around wellness, culture, and sports. Its world-class amenities include five-a-side and full-size soccer fields, indoor tennis courts, a fully equipped gym, swimming pool, 5-km cycling path, professional skatepark, multiple playgrounds, and a dog park. One of the biggest highlights is the newly opened Country Day School campus within the community, offering top-tier education just steps from home.Casa Aurea @ Espinal is an ideal choice for families looking for a contemporary, functional, and warm home in a secure, well-designed setting. Perfect for those who value quality living, outdoor spaces, and proximity to premium educational and recreational amenities.

["Villa Vista Bamb\u00fa Home in Villa Real \u2013 Villa Real", " Santa Ana", " San Jos\u00e9"]
description: Villa Vista Bamb is a stunning contemporary residence designed for both modern living and entertaining in the prestigious Villa Real community of Santa Ana, on the west side of San Jos. Spanning two levels, this four-bedroom, four-and-a-half-bathroom home is a tropical contemporary retreat, where clean architectural lines and lush greenery come together in perfect harmony. The home is nearing completion and move-in ready early in 2025, with exclusive design by Marlo Trejos.From the moment you arrive, the breeze and breathtaking terrace set the tone for a home that embraces both luxury and nature. The high ceilings and expansive windows flood the interiors with natural light, while offering picturesque views of the surrounding landscape. The private pool and terrace are framed by a mature bamboo grove, creating a serene and exclusive outdoor settinga true sanctuary for relaxation and entertainment.Inside, over 600 square meters of beautifully integrated living spaces unfold, blending indoor and outdoor areas with ease. The open-concept design ensures a smooth flow between the living, dining, and kitchen spaces, making it ideal for hosting or simply enjoying the airy, light-filled ambiance of the home.At the heart of the home, the primary suite offers a private oasis, perfect for unwinding in peace. The additional bedrooms are very spacious, thoughtfully crafted with large windows that invite the outdoors in. Every space in Villa Vista Bamb is designed to enhance well-being and connection with nature, ensuring a home that is both modern and peaceful.Eco Residencial Villa Real, located between Escaz and Santa Ana, is one of the most exclusive communities in the western part of San Jos. Known for its top-tier security, landscaped gardens, and family-friendly environment, Villa Real offers an exceptional lifestyle. Residents enjoy, hiking trails through lush greenery and beautiful outdoor spaces that integrate seamlessly with a neighboring natural reserve.Villa Reals prime location provides easy access to Route 27, connecting you to Santa Ana, Escaz, San Jos, and Lindora within minutes. The area is home to high-end shopping, top-tier schools, fine dining, and essential services, making it one of the most desirable residential communities in Costa Rica.With its sophisticated design, seamless integration with nature, and prime location, Villa Vista Bamb Home in Villa Real is an extraordinary opportunity for those seeking a modern, luxurious, and tranquil home.
