address: ["Buka Contemporary Home Fully Furnished @ Espinal \u2013 Hacienda Espinal", " San Rafael", " Heredia Province"]
description: Inviting fully integrated areas filled with natural light. Buka Contemporary is a single-level, fully furnished home featuring floor-to-ceiling windows, a refreshing terrace and vaulted ceilings accented by natural wood beams. The property has a great location within Hacienda Espinal, a residential community northwest of San Jos, with 24/7 security, controlled access, skate park, sculpture park, clubhouse, pool, and a full range of kids and nature areas. The strategic location offers direct access to the 27 Highway which connects to Santa Ana, Escaz and San Jos in one direction and the Pacific Coast beaches in the other. The main faade at Buka Contemporary Home sets the tone for the materials and style within the home, a distinct contemporary feel. The straight-line design leads to a double-wide front door at the entrance. Expansive floor-to-ceiling windows combined with double-height vaulted wood-ceilings and garden views ensure a fresh ambiance and flood the social area with natural light. The social area is framed by a large stone wall and a beautiful indoor garden. Buka Contemporarys living and dining rooms fully integrate with the kitchen. The kitchen boasts a stunning central counter for food prep, sharing and entertaining. The central kitchen island combines wood detailing with the white countertops that characterize the kitchen. Both the dining room and the kitchen can open to the terrace through glass sliding doors, adding a fresh touch to each area. The terrace is completely open to the garden and includes a built-in bar area with social counter. This is a delicately designed space with a live plant wall and an open feel. Back at the main entrance, the left side of Buka Contemporary is the private area. Two secondary bedrooms each include a closet and share a large bathroom. The bedrooms have glass sliding doors that open to the garden, granting them green views in a private setting. Buka Contemporarys master suite has multiple access to the garden, filling the room with a rejuvenating and peaceful air. The master bathroom is equipped with a walk-in closet and a well-distributed bathroom. Buka Contemporary Home awaits in one of the newest and most exclusive residential communities on the outside perimeter of San Jos, in Alajuela, 15-20 minutes from Santa Ana and Escaz. Hacienda Espinal's great amenities include a luxurious clubhouse with two lounge areas equipped with air conditioning, dressing rooms and a large swimming pool. Hacienda Espinal offers basketball, tennis and soccer courts, as well as a bike and skate park. Buka Contemporary is a unique opportunity, with the Country Day School inside the community and quick access to Route 27 towards the Pacific Coast.Buka Contemporary Home is a great opportunity to live in a fully furnished, single-level residence that blends modern design, natural light, and garden views in one of the most exclusive communities in Alajuela.

address: ["Trivana Home @ Hacienda Espinal \u2013 Hacienda Espinal", " San Rafael", " Heredia Province"]
description: With a bold design and family-focused layout, Trivana Home @ Hacienda Espinal is a newly built rental home in one of the area's most desirable gated communities. The house features four bedrooms, well-planned living spaces, and exceptional outdoor areas with exclusive amenities.Trivana Homes facade blends exposed concrete with soft grey and brown tones, illuminated by architectural lighting that highlights the vertical lines repeated throughout the propertyfrom the front exterior to the interior and backyard.Inside, the home opens toward the rear social areas. The living room and dining room are separated by a modern fireplace with a built-in TV, an elegant, understated focal point. The living room offers double-height ceilings and opens to an interior garden, while the dining area flows into a contemporary kitchen with integrated design, featuring panel-covered appliances that blend with the cabinetry, along with a spacious pantry. The entire social space is equipped with central air conditioning for added comfort.Glass sliding doors connect the indoor areas to a covered terrace with a built-in bar and lounging space. A sun deck wraps around the integrated pool, which can be outfitted with protection if needed. Theres also an outdoor shower and a full bathroom dedicated to the pool area. The rear garden surrounds the home, providing additional privacy and green space.Floating stairs with a glass railing lead to the upper level, where the primary suite enjoys natural light, privacy, and access to a generous balcony overlooking the boulevard. The en-suite bathroom features dual vanities, dual indoor showers, and a private outdoor shower for a resort-style experience. A cozy TV room with a coffee station connects directly to the suite or through the open hallway with double-height views.Two secondary bedrooms are also located on this floor, each with its own full bathroom, walk-in closet, and balcony. A built-in linen closet and access to an attic storage area complete the upper level.On the main floor, theres an additional guest bedroom with a full bathroom, perfect for visitors or use as a home office or studio. The two-car covered garage has a paved driveway and storage bodega. The service area includes a maids quarters with a full bathroom and independent entrance, along with a spacious laundry room. The entire property is enclosed and surrounded by foliage, offering privacy without sacrificing natural light.Hacienda Espinal, located in San Rafael de Alajuela, is a thoughtfully planned residential community known for its healthy lifestyle concept and premium infrastructure. With 24/7 security, green spaces, a clubhouse, swimming pool, soccer and tennis courts, and a fully equipped gym, the community promotes a balanced, family-oriented way of life.Additional amenities include a dog park, 5-kilometer bike and running trail, multiple playgrounds, and a large skate park. The prestigious Country Day School has recently opened its campus within the community, offering excellent education within walking distance. Nearby grocery options like Auto Mercado and Vindi add everyday convenience without compromising the quiet lifestyle.

description: This 1 Bedroom 1 Bath is brand new completed in Dec 2023. This community consists of 12 brand new contemporary modern residences stretching across a large track riverfront land surrounded by a security wall and fence. Riviera Residences is a open living concept, incorporating water and animal sounds throughout the year. Monkeys have made the tree in the center of the property their favorite hang out spots now for years. All units have high ceilings with large windows to all glass walls allowing the stunning canopy to become part of every living space of this contemporary modern community. Every house was designed to fit each particular location to allow for optimal views and was positioned for optimal privacy through architectural and landscaping design. Each property is named after the wood it has been incorporated with. Every tree that was used for the highend woodfinishes resembles a history in this community. Riviera Residences features include a large, secured parking area, a large wade pool/fountain, a large community pool, Pool bar, and common restroom facilities (double sink, double showers, and two restrooms) for large group entertainment in the common pool and wade pool/fountain, and garden areas throughout the complex. The astro turf throughout the common areas with tropical landscaping provides for shade and privacy throughout the property.Surfside - Playa Potrero - Playa Flamingo. Potrero Beach is less then a 5 min walk from the residences. Simply turn left leaving the gate and you will reach the ocean. You can even hear the ocean break from the property itself. MerKado and Wendy Grocery stores are about 10 min walking distance with at least 15 restaurants in the immediate area. Here we ask what beach you want to go to as we are within minutes of the nicest beaches in the country (Playa Piratas, Mina, Conchal, Flamingo, Penca, Prieta, Pan de Azucar, Dantita, Zapotal, etc. are all stunning white sand beaches. With Brasiltio, Danta, Potrero beaches being stunningly beautiful just a little darker in sand color. Surfing just south in Tamarindo, Playa Grande, Avellanas, Negra, ., ... and a boat ride to Ollie's Point and Witche's Rock just north offers world class surfing all year long. This is also one of the fishing spots in the world with Coco, Flamingo, Tamarindo offering daily fishing tours in multitude to match your budget.

address: ["Riviera Casa 5: Near the Coast and Riverfront House For Rent in Playa PotreroCalle aguacate", " Playa Potrero", " Guanacaste Province"]
description: This beautiful house of 3-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom house is fully equipped and was completed in January 2024, making it completely new. The spacious kitchen of this modern and contemporary home serves both the large living room and the outdoor living area. The Riviera residential community consists of 6 units spread across 4 consecutive riverfront lots, surrounded by a security wall and fence. Riviera is an open living concept, incorporating the sounds of water and animals year-round with gardens, a wading pool, and a fountain for everyone to enjoy. Monkeys have made the tree in the center of the property one of their favorite places to spend time for years.All units have high ceilings with large windows to all glass walls allowing the stunning canopy to become part of every living space in this community. Every house was designed to fit each particular location to allow for optimal views and privacy through architectural and landscaping designs. Each property is named after the wood it has been incorporated with. Every tree that was used for the high-end wood finishes and furniture has fallen on or near the property during Otto and Nate tropical storms. None of the wood has been cut but all fell naturally and the owners have taken great detail and investment to furnish the units with the greatest woods in a sustainable conscious way. The community features include a large secured parking area, a large fountain, 2 common laundry rooms, a bodega for equipment safekeeping. The newly installed fake grass throughout the common areas with tropical landscaping provides for shade and privacy throughout the property for enjoyment by all residents. Surfside - Playa Potrero - Playa Flamingo. Potrero Beach is less then a 5 min walk from the residences. Simply turn left leaving the gate and you will reach the ocean. You can even hear the ocean break from the property itself. MerKado and Wendy Grocery stores are about 10 min walking distance with at least 15 restaurants in the immediate area. Here we ask what beach you want to go to as we are within minutes of the nicest beaches in the country (Playa Piratas, Mina, Conchal, Flamingo, Penca, Prieta, Pan de Azucar, Dantita, Zapotal, etc. are all stunning white sand beaches. With Brasiltio, Danta, Potrero beaches being stunningly beautiful just a little darker in sand color. Surfing just south in Tamarindo, Playa Grande, Avellanas, Negra, ., ... and a boat ride to Ollie's Point and Witche's Rock just north offers world class surfing all year long. This is also one of the fishing spots in the world with Coco, Flamingo, Tamarindo offering daily fishing tours in multitude to match your budget.

address: ["Surfer's Paradise Casa Olas: Beachfront Rental Home on Playa Grande", " Playa Grande", " Guanacaste Province"]
description: This quaint, 2 bedroom beach-cottage home is located right on Playa Grande with perfect surf breaks just footsteps from your living room. The house is fully furnished, air conditioned and has 2 king bedrooms that comfortably sleeps 4 people along with a fully equipped kitchen, wifi, TV and local area telephone. Enjoy the beach, garden and ocean views from the back patio and go surfing any time you feel the urge. Palm Beach Estates is a quiet, private community in Playa Grande with a supermarket, surf school and several restaurants within in walking distance.Playa Grande Baula National Park is one of Costa Rica's most popular beaches among expads and ticos alike, as it is known as one of the absolute best surfing beaches in Central America. It's also famous as a Leatherback Turtle nesting area where the Leatherback Turtle Museum and Research Center offers night tours. Due to being located inside of a National Park, the beach is protected for the nesting of the Giant Leatherback Sea Turtles from October through April. The beach is open year around during the day, but during nesting season, you are required to be with a tour guide to be on the beach after dark. More surf shops and a many more restaurants are just north of Playa Grande going toward Tamarindo, which a water taxi or ferry can get you there in 5-10 min. This area is one Costa Rica's most popular tourist beaches with lots of entertainment, dining, activities, banking and souvenir, surf, cloth, and hardware shopping.

description: Welcome to Villas, an oasis of comfort and accessibility in the heart of San Ramn, Costa Rica. Our villas have been meticulously designed to meet the needs of wheelchair users, seniors, and those with disabilities, offering a safe, inclusive, and welcoming environment. Each villa has been adapted with special features that promote independence and ease of movement. From wide doors and spacious hallways to accessible bathrooms with support bars and floor-level showers, we ensure that every detail is thoughtfully crafted to provide comfort and security. In addition to their accessibility, our villas are an example of sustainability and environmental respect. We are proud to have the prestigious Blue Flag Eco-label, a recognition of our commitment to conservation and protection of the natural environment. With renewable energy systems, recycling practices, and organic gardens, our villas are a model of self-sustainability and environmental responsibility. Located in the picturesque surroundings of San Ramn, residents of Villas enjoy the tranquility of the surrounding nature while having access to all the amenities and services of the city. From shops and restaurants to medical and recreational centers, everything is within easy reach to ensure a full and active life. At Villas Horizon, we not only offer a place to live but an inclusive community where everyone is welcome and can thrive. Join us and discover the perfect balance between comfort, accessibility, and sustainability in the heart of Costa Rica. address: ["Guana 1 Jungle Riverside: Contemporary Modern 1 Bed 1 Bath Riverfront Residence for Rent in Surfside / Playa Potrero", " Playa Potrero", " Guanacaste Province"]
description: This 1 Bedroom 1 Bath is brand new completed in Dec 2023. This community consists of 12 brand new contemporary modern residences stretching across a large track riverfront land surrounded by a security wall and fence. Riviera Residences is a open living concept, incorporating water and animal sounds throughout the year. Monkeys have made the tree in the center of the property their favorite hang out spots now for years. All units have high ceilings with large windows to all glass walls allowing the stunning canopy to become part of every living space of this contemporary modern community. Every house was designed to fit each particular location to allow for optimal views and was positioned for optimal privacy through architectural and landscaping design. Each property is named after the wood it has been incorporated with. Every tree that was used for the highend woodfinishes resembles a history in this community. Riviera Residences features include a large secured parking area, a large wade pool/fountain, a large community pool, Pool bar, and common restroom facilities (double sink, double showers, and two restrooms) for large group entertainment in the common pool and wade pool/fountain, and garden areas throughout the complex. The astro turf throughout the common areas with tropical landscaping provides for shade and privacy throughout the property.Surfside - Playa Potrero - Playa Flamingo. Potrero Beach is less then a 5 min walk from the residences. Simply turn left leaving the gate and you will reach the ocean. You can even hear the ocean break from the property itself. MerKado and Wendy Grocery stores are about 10 min walking distance with at least 15 restaurants in the immediate area. Here we ask what beach you want to go to as we are within minutes of the nicest beaches in the country (Playa Piratas, Mina, Conchal, Flamingo, Penca, Prieta, Pan de Azucar, Dantita, Zapotal, etc. are all stunning white sand beaches. With Brasiltio, Danta, Potrero beaches being stunningly beautiful just a little darker in sand color. Surfing just south in Tamarindo, Playa Grande, Avellanas, Negra, ., ... and a boat ride to Ollie's Point and Witche's Rock just north offers world class surfing all year long. This is also one of the fishing spots in the world with Coco, Flamingo, Tamarindo offering daily fishing tours in multitude to match your budget.

description: 400252928010 - FOR SALE, Villa del Golfo, Luxury and Tranquility in Cabo Blanco de Puntarenas, Costa Rica - Nestled atop the hills of Cabo Blanco, Villa del Golfo stands majestically. This luxurious 400-square-meter residence enjoys a privileged position with exceptional 360-degree views. Two bathrooms are upstairs, one of which is en suite. Another bathroom, comprising a toilet and sink, is on the ground floor.In addition to the main house, a condominium with a separate entrance is located at the lower part of the property. It includes a personal pool, terrace, two air-conditioned bedrooms, a full bathroom, and a well-appointed kitchen.The main house is complemented by its pool, offering a secluded oasis within the larger paradise.Location: Villa del Golfo is located in the Gulf of Nicoya, just 5 minutes from the Playa Naranjo ferry and 15 minutes from Jicaral, where all amenities such as shops, supermarkets, pharmacies, restaurants, doctors, and hospitals can be found. This part of Guanacaste is truly peaceful, inviting moments of relaxation.It is not just a residence; it is a statement of opulence and a celebration of the Costa Rican coastal lifestyle. Every element of this property is meticulously designed to offer a haven of luxury and tranquility.The house is sold fully furnished, including all carefully selected fine furniture and decorations to complement the style and elegance of the residence.Feel free to come and visit to experience this harmony for yourself.

address: ["Golfito>Golfito", " Golfito", " Puntarenas", " Golfito", " Puntarenas"]
description: 400032981018 - Golfito Jungle House - Introducing the One of a kind Golfito Jungle House Nestled within the tranquil confines of the National Park, just above KM 1, this unique property offers an unparalleled blend of serene seclusion and convenient access. A mere 5-minute stroll leads you to the heart of Golfito, where you'll find essential amenities such as grocery stores, schools, shopping centers, and the ferry terminal. Yet, as you step onto this property, you'll instantly feel transported to a world far removed from the hustle and bustle of civilization.What sets this property apart is its extraordinary location within the national park. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail by a discerning German engineer, who imbued the design with Feng shui principles, this house predates the park's establishment. Consequently, the owners have enjoyed undisputed possession rights for nearly three decades. While traditional title deeds are not applicable in this instance, the house is duly registered with the municipality. Moreover, the negligible annual fee for garbage collection is offset by the absence of property taxes.Nestled at the end of a secluded driveway, the property exudes privacy and exclusivity. Crossing your private bridge over a serene creek, you'll arrive at the housea bastion of solid concrete construction adorned with a new roof. Inside, you'll discover five bedrooms (four equipped with air conditioning), two full baths, a separate toilet, as well as a spacious living room and kitchen. The internal timbers boast the rare and luxurious nazarena wood, also known as purple heart.Step onto the full wrap-around undercover patio and envision yourself basking in the tranquility of nature. From here, marvel at the diverse wildlife, including daily visits from playful monkeys, as you immerse yourself in the verdant embrace of the tropical rainforest. Alternatively, find solace by your very own koi pond and fountains, surrounded by exotic flora sourced from across the country.In terms of modern conveniences, the house is equipped with a brand-new 5G Fibre optic internet connection, ensuring seamless connectivity. Water is readily available, sourced from a gravity-fed system originating from a majestic 100+ foot waterfall, just a brief two-minute walk from the house.This One of a kind Golfito Jungle House offers a rare opportunity to own a slice of paradise, where luxury and natural beauty converge harmoniously.

address: ["Casa Guana I: Modern Efficiency Riverfront Residence for Rent in Surfside / Playa Potrerocalle aguacate", " Playa Potrero", " Guanacaste Province"]
description: Guana 1 is a modern 1 bedroom studio style home with high ceilings and lots of light from the riverside. The property was completely refreshed in July 2021. This community consists of 5 units stretching across 4 consecutive riverfront lots surrounded by a security wall and fence. Aqua is an open living concept, which incorporates water and animal sounds throughout the year. Monkeys have made the tree in the center of the property their favorite hang out spots now for years. All units have high ceilings with large windows to all glass walls allowing the stunning canopy to become part of every living space in this community. Every house was designed to fit each particular location to allow for optimal views and privacy through architectural and landscaping design. Each Property is named after the wood it has been incorporated with. Every tree that was used for the highend woodfinishes and furniture has fallen on the property during Otto and Nate tropical storms. None of the wood has been cut but all fell naturally and the owners have taken great detail and investment to furnish the units with the greatest woods in a sustainable conscious way. The community features include a large secured parking area, a large fountain, 2 common laundry rooms, a bodega for equipment safekeeping. The newly installed fake grass throughout the common areas with tropical landscaping provides for shade and privacy throughout the property for enjoyment by all residents. Surfside - Playa Potrero - Playa Flamingo. Potrero Beach is less then a 5 min walk from the residences. Simply turn left leaving the gate and you will reach the ocean. You can even hear the ocean break from the property itself. MerKado and Wendy Grocery stores are about 10 min walking distance with at least 15 restaurants in the immediate area. Here we ask what beach you want to go to as we are within minutes of the nicest beaches in the country (Playa Piratas, Mina, Conchal, Flamingo, Penca, Prieta, Pan de Azucar, Dantita, Zapotal, etc. are all stunning white sand beaches. With Brasiltio, Danta, Potrero beaches being stunningly beautiful just a little darker in sand color. Surfing just south in Tamarindo, Playa Grande, Avellanas, Negra, ., ... and a boat ride to Ollie's Point and Witche's Rock just north offers world class surfing all year long. This is also one of the fishing spots in the world with Coco, Flamingo, Tamarindo offering daily fishing tours in multitude to match your budget.
